title: Pay Day 2 - Beta Repack
description:
Year: 2013
Genre: Action (Shooter) / 3D / Online-Only
Developer: Overkill Software - Starbreeze Studios
Publisher: 505 Games
Platform: PC
Language: English
Sound language: English
Publication Type: Beta Version
Game Version: 0.0.9


::Description::

PayDay 2 co-op shooter game for four players, allowing everyone to get used again
to the role of the heroes of the original PayDay Dallas, Hoxton, Cheynsa and Wulff. The new network Crimenet offers a wide variety of cases from the relatively simple attacks on shops and abduction, robbery storage bankov.Po to progress through the missions, a team of four players sent to the more complex and profitable mission

::System Requirements::

Operating system: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor with a clock frequency of 2.8 GHz
RAM: 2 GB
Video Card: 512 MB VRAM
Sound system: compatible with DirectX
Hard disk space: 12 GB
